original: @85b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @85b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: au tsushma dzambha la au pa de sha sto tra /
analyzed: au tsushma dzambha la au pa de sha sto tra /
translated: Ucchusamajambhalaupadesa-stotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba'i man ngag gi bstod pa /
analyzed: rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba'i man ngag gi bstod pa /
translated: The Instruction of the Praise of Ucchusamajambhala

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrasattva.

original: mgon po nam mkha'i mdog can nor gyi char 'bebs pa //
analyzed: mgon po nam mkha'i mdog can nor gyi char 'bebs pa //
translated: Protector, the color of the sky, you cause a rain of wealth to fall.

original: ma skyes rang bzhin dag pas sku mdog nag por bzhugs //
analyzed: ma skyes rang bzhin dag pas sku mdog nag por bzhugs //
translated: Unborn, pure by nature, you dwell in a black body.

original: khyod ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid de bdag dran na //
analyzed: khyod ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid de bdag dran na //
translated: When I recall that you are Vajrasattva himself,

original: khyod la 'dud kyis thugs rjes ci yi phyir mi gzigs //
analyzed: khyod la 'dud kyis thugs rjes ci yi phyir mi gzigs //
translated: I bow to you. Why do you not look upon me with compassion?

original: lo drug byis pa'i gzugs la gzhon pa'i sha rgyas pa //
analyzed: lo drug byis pa'i gzugs la gzhon pa'i sha rgyas pa //
translated: Your body is that of a six-year-old child, with the plump flesh of youth.

original: 'dzum la khro la byams pa'i mche ba dkar po gtsigs //
analyzed: 'dzum la khro la byams pa'i mche ba dkar po gtsigs //
translated: You smile, are wrathful, and bare your white fangs in affection.

original: khro gnyer dpral bar bsnyer zhing ral pa dmar ser langs //
analyzed: khro gnyer dpral bar bsnyer zhing ral pa dmar ser langs //
translated: Your brow is furrowed with frowns, and your orange hair stands on end.

original: dbul ba sel mdzad spyan yangs snying rje can la 'dud //
analyzed: dbul ba sel mdzad spyan yangs snying rje can la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, the compassionate one with wide eyes, who removes poverty.

original: mi bskyod dbu la bzhugs bas thugs kyi rig 'dzin cing //
analyzed: mi bskyod dbu la bzhugs bas thugs kyi rig 'dzin cing //
translated: You are the knowledge-holder of mind, dwelling on Akshobhya's head.

original: byams pas kun la khros te gcir bu sprul gyis brgyan //
analyzed: byams pas kun la khros te gcir bu sprul gyis brgyan //
translated: He is angry with everyone, and is adorned with a garland of fresh snakes.

original: aom aa las skyes nor sbyin gdan la bzhugs shing 'gying //
analyzed: aom aa las skyes nor sbyin gdan la bzhugs shing 'gying //
translated: Oá¹ƒ. I bow to you, Kubera, who is born from a, who sits on a seat, who is majestic,

original: re ba skong mdzad dpag bsam shing 'dra khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: re ba skong mdzad dpag bsam shing 'dra khyod la 'dud //
translated: who fulfills hopes, who is like a wish-fulfilling tree.

original: phyag g-yas snying rjes don mdzad thod pa khrag gis bkang //
analyzed: phyag g-yas snying rjes don mdzad thod pa khrag gis bkang //
translated: Your right hand, which performs the purpose of compassion, is filled with blood.

original: phyag g-yon nor spyin ma bzung ne'u les rin chen 'bebs //
analyzed: phyag g-yon nor spyin ma bzung ne'u les rin chen 'bebs //
translated: Your left hand holds a treasure-granting mongoose.

original: g-yas g-yon zhabs kyis rnam thos sras kyi rkang brdzis //
analyzed: g-yas g-yon zhabs kyis rnam thos sras kyi rkang brdzis //
translated: Your right and left feet trample the feet of VaiÅ›ravaá¹‡a.

original: nor bdag gan rkyal gnon cing brgyad bskum bzhugs la 'dud //
analyzed: nor bdag gan rkyal gnon cing brgyad bskum bzhugs la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, who sit on Kubera, pressing down on his chest and knees.

original: rnam ba ma phug rigs ngan cha lugs lhag ma za //ðŸ”½lag nas kha ru 'o ma'i bdud rtsi rtsa lam rdo rje nas byung ste //
analyzed: rnam ba ma phug rigs ngan cha lugs lhag ma za // lag nas kha ru 'o ma'i bdud rtsi rtsa lam rdo rje nas byung ste //
translated: You have no orifices, and you wear the remaining garments of an outcaste.

original: gur gum @86a * //
analyzed: gur gum @86a * //
translated: From your hand to your mouth, the nectar of milk comes through the channel of the vajra.ðŸ”½It is the color of saffron.

original: mdog 'dra zhal du phul bas mnyes mdzod la //
analyzed: mdog 'dra zhal du phul bas mnyes mdzod la //
translated: Please offer it to your mouth.

original: nyid kyis bdag gi bsam mkhyen re ba myur du skongs //
analyzed: nyid kyis bdag gi bsam mkhyen re ba myur du skongs //
translated: You know my thoughts. Quickly fulfill my hopes.ðŸ”½Consecrated with the ten-syllable mantra,

original: yi ge bcu pas byin brlabs me tog dang bcas pas //
analyzed: yi ge bcu pas byin brlabs me tog dang bcas pas //
translated: together with flowers,

original: aom las 'od 'phros gdub bu rin chen spras pas brgyan //
analyzed: aom las 'od 'phros gdub bu rin chen spras pas brgyan //
translated: Light radiates from the Oá¹‚ and adorns the wrists with jeweled bracelets.

original: aom las byung ba'i bum pa bzang pos chu phul nas //
analyzed: aom las byung ba'i bum pa bzang pos chu phul nas //
translated: The excellent vase arisen from the Oá¹‚ bestows the water consecration.

original: bcom ldan mgon po ci phyir re ba mi bskong lags //
analyzed: bcom ldan mgon po ci phyir re ba mi bskong lags //
translated: Bhagavat, Protector, why do you not fulfill my hopes?ðŸ”½You are renowned for your compassion, which fulfills the hopes of all six kinds of beings,

original: 'gro drug kun la re bskong nor gyi char pa dag / ci 'dod mang po 'bebs pa'i thugs rje grags lags na //
analyzed: 'gro drug kun la re bskong nor gyi char pa dag / ci 'dod mang po 'bebs pa'i thugs rje grags lags na //
translated: showering down a rain of wealth, whatever is desired.

original: bdag gis mos pas khyod kyi yon tan rtag tu brjod //
analyzed: bdag gis mos pas khyod kyi yon tan rtag tu brjod //
translated: I praise you with devotion, always proclaiming your qualities.

original: thigs pa gcig kyang mi stsol skal pa med dam ci ;
analyzed: thigs pa gcig kyang mi stsol skal pa med dam ci ;
translated: Do I lack the good fortune to receive even a drop?

original: / nyi ma re re bzhin du rtag tu khyod 'bod na //
analyzed: / nyi ma re re bzhin du rtag tu khyod 'bod na //
translated: Every day I call out to you,

original: bdag ni yi chad sgyid lugs gdong pa dag mod kyang //
analyzed: bdag ni yi chad sgyid lugs gdong pa dag mod kyang //
translated: but I am discouraged and disheartened, my face downcast.

original: khyod kyi sngon gyi dam bcas thugs rje gang du thal //
analyzed: khyod kyi sngon gyi dam bcas thugs rje gang du thal //
translated: Where has gone the compassion of your former vows?

original: gter chen skal ba med kyang log 'tsho med tsam byin //
analyzed: gter chen skal ba med kyang log 'tsho med tsam byin //
translated: Even though I am not worthy of the great treasure, give me just enough to live without wrong livelihood.

original: bdag gis snying nas smras kyang da dung ma gzigs na //
analyzed: bdag gis snying nas smras kyang da dung ma gzigs na //
translated: Though I speak from the depths of my heart, you still do not look upon me.

original: sa gsum kun la snyoms par dam ni ma bcas sam //
analyzed: sa gsum kun la snyoms par dam ni ma bcas sam //
translated: Did you not vow to be impartial to all three worlds?

original: bdag la skal ba med kyang thugs rjes cis mi gzigs //
analyzed: bdag la skal ba med kyang thugs rjes cis mi gzigs //
translated: Even if I am unfortunate, why do you not look upon me with compassion?

original: sems can min nam dbul pa'i sdug bsngal bral par mdzod //
analyzed: sems can min nam dbul pa'i sdug bsngal bral par mdzod //
translated: Am I not a sentient being? Free me from the suffering of poverty!

original: bdag gis bos pas khyod kyi thugs rje'i zhags pa yis //
analyzed: bdag gis bos pas khyod kyi thugs rje'i zhags pa yis //
translated: When I call out, with the lasso of your compassion

original: srid 'dir dbul ba sol ba bde chen gnas su drongs ;
analyzed: srid 'dir dbul ba sol ba bde chen gnas su drongs ;
translated: Remove my poverty in this life and lead me to the realm of great bliss.

original: /'jigs la 'jigs par mi byed khyod kyis byin brlabs te //
analyzed: /'jigs la 'jigs par mi byed khyod kyis byin brlabs te //
translated: Do not be afraid of fear, but bless me

original: 'di dang pha rol gnyis kar rtag tu bskyab par mdzod //
analyzed: 'di dang pha rol gnyis kar rtag tu bskyab par mdzod //
translated: And always protect me in this life and the next.

original: rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba'i man ngag gi bstod pa bla ma dha byang chub sems dpas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba'i man ngag gi bstod pa bla ma dha byang chub sems dpas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the praise of the instructions of the wrathful Varuna composed by the bodhisattva master Dha.

original: // / kha cig slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas mdzad do zhes kyang zer skad do//
analyzed: // / kha cig slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas mdzad do zhes kyang zer skad do//
translated: Some say it was composed by the master SÅ«ryagupta.
